about.HEADLINE: About us
about.TEXT: As an experienced construction supplier, we offer you high-quality products for construction and renovation projects. Our range includes power trowels, accessories, protective films, and concrete mortar – all made from premium materials. We place great importance on quality, fast delivery, and comprehensive advice to help you carry out your building projects efficiently and successfully. Rely on our expertise and let us support you as a dependable partner for all your construction needs.

welding.HEADLINE: Welding Technology in Metal Construction – Connections That Last
welding.DESCRIPTION_1: In our metal construction company, welding technology is a key element for stable, precise, and durable structures. Whether railings, staircases, gates, or custom fabrications – we join metal with the utmost care and in accordance with the latest technical standards.
welding.LIST_1: MIG/MAG, TIG, and manual arc welding
welding.LIST_2: Processing of steel, stainless steel, and aluminum
welding.LIST_3: Custom solutions for indoor and outdoor applications
welding.LIST_4: Fabrication of components and structures based on plans or measurements
welding.LIST_5: Welding according to DIN EN 1090 and DIN EN ISO 9606 standards
welding.LIST_6: Visual inspection and quality assurance by trained professionals
welding.DESCRIPTION_2: Our welders are qualified and work according to recognized standards. This ensures that every joint is not only technically flawless but also aesthetically clean – for the highest customer satisfaction and long-lasting quality.
welding.LIST_2_4: Custom-built Structures According to Customer Specifications

products.name: STS-11HC Topping Spreader
description_items: Joystick control – propel, steer, boom, rotate, head loading & spread functions
Automatic elevation control – keep head close to surface to reduce dust

products.name: SRS-4e – Electric Laser Screed
description_items: Long Lasting, 3-Phase 48 VAC electric motor – whisper quiet, emission-less operation
4-wheel drive for traction in any subgrade condition
Intelligent Steering uniquely rotates the tires to desired angle or direction for incredible maneuverability
Operator Selectable Steering includes 2-wheel, 4-wheel, and crab modes for the best maneuvering in any situation
Compact “no-nonsense” design with no lower frame saves weight, creates 360° visibility, thus improving worker safety

Utilizes the Somero® signature features such as Quick GradeSet System ® for fast 1-person set up, QuickPass, Soft Landing, Column Block protection, Head Self-Level-System, and more to maximize efficiency and quality with every pass
Conveniences include LED work lights, LCD display with build in diagnostics, choice of turf or lugged tires, independent auger and vibrator adjustability
Industry accredited Training via Somero Concrete Institute; Self-study LMS program with 24×7 access; and On-site options
Additional Options: Tool Box Storage, Pressure Washer, Laser Options, 3-D Profiler, Operator Sear, Silver or Gold Pars Kit (Bronze Kit Included), Annual Service Agreements, Extended Warranties

products.name: SkyStrip Plywood Stripping Machine
description_items: Intelligent Steering adjusts steering angle to prevent stress and damage to components
Steering capabilities include 2 wheel, 4 wheel, and crab-style options
Reduces lost labor time due to injury in one the most injury prone activities in the shoring process, no overhead work and waist-high sheet handling.
Reduces material waste in the manual sheets stripping process by 50%, dropped sheets from manual process.
Reduced manpower needed in the sheet stripping process, sheet stripping can be managed by a single operator.
Weight Total Weight 2,500 lbs / 1,113 kg w/ for lift attachment 2,700 lbs / 1,213 kg

products.name: SRS-6S Laser Screed
description_items: Head Shift means increased flexibility in positioning; utilization of proportional hydraulics allows for precise adjustments during operation.
Powerful 25hp Kubota diesel engine with Tier 4 Final compliant emissions; no D.E.F. or regeneration required
4-wheel drive for incredible traction in any subgrade condition.
Manual head rotation feature means no head removal for easy transportion and accessing projects.
Tilt assist for easy cleaning of the machine head.

Operator selectable self centering steering includes 2-wheel, 4-wheel, and crab modes for seamless maneuverability while driving sideways, eliminating the need to toggle between modes for repositioning.

Utilizes the Somero® signature features such as Quick GradeSet System ® for fast 1-person set up, QuickPass, Soft Landing, Column Block protection, Head Self-Level-System, and more to maximize efficiency and quality with every pass
3 NEW drive modes for unparalleled maneuverability
Effortless movement with the ability to turn and maneuver in screed mode, improving overall efficiency and reducing repositioning time.

products.name: Floor Levelness System
description_items: TRAINING TOOL FOR NEW AND EXPERIENCED OPERATORS: New operators can learn proper techniques for stabilizer adjustment, head touchdowns, and boom speed. Continuous feedback is provided reinforcing concepts and alerting the operator.
MAXIMIZE LASER SCREED PERFORMANCE: Experienced operators can fine tune their techniques and know when to adjust valve speeds to optimize the screeding performance for that day’s productivity.

HELP ISOLATE ISSUES WITH FLOOR QUALITY: Floor quality can be challenging to understand because the floor is measured after all aspects of the pour are complete. Some processes before and after screeding can improve floor quality while others can lower it. The advantage of the Floor Levelness System® is that if the scoring system remains high then the screed is working well. Thus the question of what else has changed can be asked. This helps isolate changes from pour-to-pour to better understand what impacts floor quality.

products.name: Siteshape System
description_items: Provides quick set-up with laser screed.
Compatible with numerous grading equipment: graders, dozers, etc.

products.name: 3-D Concrete Profiler System
description_items: Automatic & accurate paving of contoured sites
Compatible with several Somero® Laser Screed® models
Share with your motor grader, dozer, skid-steer or other grading machines

products.name: Somero Line Dragon
description_items: Remote-control operation utilizes simple AA batteries
Intelligent Steering adjusts steering angle to prevent stress and damage to components
Steering capabilities include two-wheel, four-wheel, and crab-style options
Load-sensing variable-displacement hydraulics provide optimal power
Conveniences include LED work lights, tie-down points for transport, and various clamping locations
Quick access to the hydraulic manifold
Horn featured helps to eliminate hose pinching
Weight Puller: 1,150 lbs / 521.6 kg | Placer: 1,325 lbs / 601 kg

products.name: Broom + Cure Machine
description_items: Built on a hybrid of a S-15R (upper) and S-22EZ (lower) frame – performance and power to tackle all your paving jobs.
14’ proprietary broom + spray-bar + channel float head– precision-engineering to follow ACI curing guidelines
Designed space for 55-gallon drums – integrated materials-handling to keep spraying consistent and refills easy
Dual Sonic Tracer – technology from the laser screed world to ensure accurate head height during the broom and cure process
Somero’s proprietary Soft Landing and Self-Leveling System – patented technology that only our customers can benefit from to deliver smooth and consistent brooming to curing transitions
30-Gallon freshwater tank and hose – capacity to keep the head clean throughout the job
Engine Kubota D1803 Turbo 37.0 kW (49.6 hp) Tier 4 Diesel engine

products.name: SRS-4 Laser Screed
description_items: No lower frame and streamlined “no-nonsense” design creates 360° visibility keeping the operator safe and the machine lightweight, meaning Job site safety is increased
Intelligent Steering adjusts steering angle to prevent stress and damage to components
Steering capabilities include 2 wheel, 4 wheel, and crab-style options
Utilizes the Somero® signature Soft Landing feature, making every pass efficient and on-grade
Conveniences include LED work lights, optional seat and pressure-washer
Engine (Options) Kubota DH 902 T4f DieselKubota DH 972 T4f Propane

products.name: S-15R Laser Screed
description_items: 360º Machine Rotation with 2-wheel, 4-Wheel, and Crab Steering
LCD display screen with built in diagnostics
Weight 9,650 lbs | 4,377 kg w/ 10’ | 3.0 m Screed Head
Length 24’ 4” | 7.4 m w/ 10’/ 3.0 m Screed Head (transport mode)
Engine 44.3 HP | 33 kW Kubota V1505 Turbo Diesel

products.name: S-22EZ (Advanced) Laser Screed
description_items: Full Color LCD Display w/ Integrated Diagnostics
Weight 14,500 lbs | 6,577 kg (with 12′ | 3.7 m screed head)
Engine (Standard) 65 HP (48.5kW) Cummins, Turbo Diesel, Tier 4 Final 74 HP (55.4 kW) Kubota, Turbo Diesel, Stage 5*

products.name: S-28EZ Laser Screed
description_items: Over 20 new design improvements for better quality screeding
Full Color LCD Display w/ Integrated Diagnostics
Hydraulic Pressure Washer (3,000 PSI/207 Bar) & Hose Reel*
Weight 18,000 lbs | 6,577 kg (with 12′ | 3.7 m screed head)
Screed Head Width (Optional) 14’ | 4.3 mNote: width applies to vibrator component of the head

products.name: Copperhead XD 3.0
description_items: Easy to set-up, break-down, and transport
Screeds flat, single or dual slopes
Also compatible with the Somero 3-D Profiler System®
Engine (Optional) 10.3 HP | 6.7 kW Diesel Kohler KD440

products.name: Mini Screed C
description_items: Easy to set-up, break-down, and clean
Fits easily in the bed of most pick-up trucks

products.name: S-158C Laser Screed
description_items: Suitable for various applications including chaired rebar, chaired mesh, heat tubes and ice rinks, etc.
Propulsion 4-wheel drive with proportional joystick and valve driving hydraulic motors
Tires 30.48 cm | 80/100 x 21” motorcycle tire with aggressive treads
Weight 658 kg | 1,450 lbs with Screed Head attached

products.name: S-940 Laser Screed
description_items: Auger Screed Head can screed on Chaired Mesh, Chaired Rebar, Heat Tubes, some slab-on-deck and more.
Raking/Fine Grade Head for raking concrete, finish grading or spreading material (sand, stone, etc.).
Auto valve calibration for consistent, unsurpassed performance
Works well with slump as low as 3 ½” / 8.9 cm
Engine (Optional) Diesel 24.8 HP | 18 kW Kubota DH902

products.name: S-940E Electric Laser Screed
description_items: 35,000 sq. feet on single charge* (3,250 sq m)
4 hours to full charge when using a 240v outlet
10 hours to full charge when using a 120v outlet
Utilizes rugged Li-ion batteries designed for construction equipment
Easy connection, charging, and swapping of batteries means streamlined maintenance, minimizing downtime
Maintains power and performance while reducing noise pollution and eliminating exhaust
User-friendly design makes for easy and safe operation, minimal training required
Long-term cost-effectiveness, reduced overall investment*performance may vary based on charging and jobsite conditions

products.name: S-485 Laser Screed
description_items: Screeds on elevated slabs or on grade
Provides better performance in difficult applications, including chaired rebar or mesh, ice rinks, in-floor heat and freezer slabs
Auto valve calibration for consistent, unsurpassed performance
Screed more concrete with the 10’ (3m) hydraulic head... increase productivity by 20%
Hydraulic Vibrator is more responsive to all slump types... consistently delivers a quality floor
Engine 20.8 HP | 15.5 kW HONDA GX630, Gasoline

products.name:
Mosquito 4-60
24 Inches
description_items: Ideal machine for trowelling and finishing perimeters and for working flush with the wall even in restricted areas. It allows you to easily pass through doors and gates of buildings and warehouses. The rubber protection on the rotating ring allows you to slide along walls or around columns without damaging the machine or the wall.
Available with a diameter of 600 or 750 mm and with 4 or 6 blades (suitable for finishing epoxy resin floors).

products.name:
Mosquito 4-75
30 Inches
description_items: Ideal machine for trowelling and finishing perimeters and for working flush with the wall even in restricted areas. It allows you to easily pass through doors and gates of buildings and warehouses. The rubber protection on the rotating ring allows you to slide along walls or around columns without damaging the machine or the wall.
Available with a diameter of 600 or 750 mm and with 4 or 6 blades (suitable for finishing epoxy resin floors).

products.name:
4-80
32 Inches
description_items: Single trowel Ø 800 mm for smoothing medium-sized surfaces that combines low cost with high performance. Equipped with a foldable “moskito” type handle and stabilizing ring.
The “HD” version is supplied with a rigid handle and an efficient reducer for heavy duty applications.

products.name:
4-90
36 inches
description_items: Single trowel ø 900 mm with 4 blades ideal for smoothing medium-sized surfaces. Allows the incorporation of hardeners for troweling and smoothing fresh concrete. Extremely balanced for optimal smoothing.

products.name:
4-120
46 Inches
description_items: Single trowel ø 1200 mm with 4 blades ideal for smoothing medium-sized surfaces. Designed to have a balance that ensures smooth driving at any speed.

products.name: Vibrant ago
description_items: High frequency immersion vibrating needle to vibrate the concrete during pouring. Lightweight and compact, it eliminates the air bubbles that inevitably form during pouring to ensure maximum homogeneity and impermeability of the concrete.

products.name: Asphalt 20
description_items: Asphalt is a powerful automatic advance joint cutter with reverse gear for deep cuts on asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. Hydraulic adjustment of the cutting depth with manual lever (or with electric pump on request) for different cutting depths. Maximum usable disc up to 450 mm in diameter for Asphalt 20 and 600 mm for Asphalt 30. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Supplied without disc.

products.name: Asphalt 30
description_items: Asphalt is a powerful automatic advance joint cutter with reverse gear for deep cuts on asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. Hydraulic adjustment of the cutting depth with manual lever (or with electric pump on request) for different cutting depths. Maximum usable disc up to 450 mm in diameter for Asphalt 20 and 600 mm for Asphalt 30. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 10
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on both asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. 70L steel water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 450 mm in diameter. On request it can be supplied with a carter for a ø 600 mm disc. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Manual cutting depth adjustment with handwheel (or hydraulic with manual lever or electric pump on request). Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 20
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on both asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. 80L steel water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 450 mm in diameter. On request, it can be supplied with a carter for a ø 600 mm disc. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Manual cutting depth adjustment with handwheel (or hydraulic with manual lever or electric pump on request). Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 30
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. Also suitable for demolishing floors. 90L steel water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 600 mm in diameter. On request it can be supplied with a carter for a ø 800 mm disc. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Hydraulic adjustment of the cutting depth with a manual lever (or with an electric pump on request). Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 6
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on both asphalt and concrete floors. 25L plastic water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 350 mm in diameter. Manual cutting depth adjustment with handwheel. Supplied without disc. Discs for fresh concrete available.

products.name:
MK8-75
30 Inches
description_items: MK8-75 is the smallest ride-on double float in the range. Equipped with two ø 750 mm rotors with 8 blades that do not cross. It floats and finishes with the same efficiency. Ideal for jobs close to walls and perfect as a complement to large machines that cannot work in tight spaces. Its dimensions allow it to pass through a standard door. Thanks to its low weight it can be positioned on the concrete before heavier machines.

products.name:
MK8-90
36 Inches
description_items: Double float with operator on board ideal for the float and finishing of medium/large concrete surfaces. Equipped with 2 rotors ø 900 mm with 8 blades that do not cross each other therefore used with float discs.

products.name:
OL-90
36 Inches
description_items: Double float with operator on board for finishing medium/large concrete surfaces. Equipped with 2 rotors ø 900 mm with 8 blades that cross. Supplied with pedal accelerator (or manual on request) and high speed kit for a brilliant smoothing.

products.name:
MK8-90 HCS – Monster
36 Inches
description_items: Double machine with operator on board for industrial flooring with dual use, both troweling and finishing, ideal for large surfaces. Equipped with 2 rotors ø 900 mm with 8 blades that do not cross. Use with trowel discs. Hydraulic driving system with 2 joysticks. Raised seat for greater visibility.

description_items: Machine suitable for laying normal or balloon sheathing for rolls from 250 to 300 metres.

description_items: Sanders, edge polishers for small surfaces and wall edges. MP8-75 and MP8-90 allow you to treat up to 2000 m2 per day. On request, stand for quick tool change.

description_items: Sanders, edge polishers for small surfaces and wall edges. MP8-75 and MP8-90 allow you to treat up to 2000 m2 per day. On request, stand for quick tool change.

products.name: Dusters br 150
description_items: Machine for spreading premixed quartz with regulated dosage and motorized advancement.

products.name: Dusters br100
description_items: Machine for spreading premixed quartz with regulated dosage.

products.name: Vibrant ago
description_items: High frequency immersion vibrating needle to vibrate the concrete during pouring. Lightweight and compact, it eliminates the air bubbles that inevitably form during pouring to ensure maximum homogeneity and impermeability of the concrete.

products.name: Vibrating straight edge with 1 handle
description_items: Petrol-powered vibrating screed with tilting aluminium profile for levelling fresh concrete floors on medium-sized surfaces.

products.name: 2-handle vibrating straightedge
description_items: Petrol powered vibrating screed, double handle with watertight vibrator. Designed for spreading concrete, leveling or finishing the surface. Easy to handle and use. Available with profiles of various lengths.

products.name: Asphalt 20
description_items: Asphalt is a powerful automatic advance joint cutter with reverse gear for deep cuts on asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. Hydraulic adjustment of the cutting depth with manual lever (or with electric pump on request) for different cutting depths. Maximum usable disc up to 450 mm in diameter for Asphalt 20 and 600 mm for Asphalt 30. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Supplied without disc.

products.name: Asphalt 30
description_items: Asphalt is a powerful automatic advance joint cutter with reverse gear for deep cuts on asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. Hydraulic adjustment of the cutting depth with manual lever (or with electric pump on request) for different cutting depths. Maximum usable disc up to 450 mm in diameter for Asphalt 20 and 600 mm for Asphalt 30. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 10
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on both asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. 70L steel water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 450 mm in diameter. On request it can be supplied with a carter for a ø 600 mm disc. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Manual cutting depth adjustment with handwheel (or hydraulic with manual lever or electric pump on request). Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 20
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on both asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. 80L steel water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 450 mm in diameter. On request, it can be supplied with a carter for a ø 600 mm disc. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Manual cutting depth adjustment with handwheel (or hydraulic with manual lever or electric pump on request). Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 30
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on asphalt and concrete floors for professional use. Also suitable for demolishing floors. 90L steel water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 600 mm in diameter. On request it can be supplied with a carter for a ø 800 mm disc. Possibility of mounting a second disc on the opposite side. Hydraulic adjustment of the cutting depth with a manual lever (or with an electric pump on request). Supplied without disc.

products.name: Floor 6
description_items: Manually operated joint cutter designed for cutting expansion joints on both asphalt and concrete floors. 25L plastic water tank. Carter designed for discs up to 350 mm in diameter. Manual cutting depth adjustment with handwheel. Supplied without disc. Discs for fresh concrete available.

products.name: Spectra LL300S
description_items: The Spectra LL300S laser level features a rugged design with a 'Hardhat' rotor guard that provides excellent protection against drops and weather. Designed to withstand severe drops of up to 1 m directly onto concrete or up to 1.5 m when tipping over on a tripod, this means less downtime and costs due to damage from accidental falls. With additional arrow keys for slope, slope adjustment can be performed while the other axis remains self-leveling.

products.name: HR150U
description_items: The HR150U laser receiver is an excellent receiver for construction contractors involved in extensive interior construction and renovation work. The dual-sided LED display and integrated magnetic mounting make it ideal for leveling and alignment tasks indoors.

products.name: Spectra GL1425C
description_items: The self-leveling GL1425C dual-grade laser is the most rugged and cost-effective laser that performs three tasks: leveling, slope adjustment, and vertical alignment. Even under harsh construction site conditions, the GL1425C delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster (up to 900 rpm) and smarter. The GL1425C features built-in Bluetooth and a dedicated Laser Remote App.

products.name: HV101
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV101 interior laser is a professional tool with an economical price tag. The HV101 laser can handle a variety of horizontal, vertical, and plumb applications. It is designed for both indoor and outdoor use with a receiver.

products.name: Theodolite DET-2
description_items: Every DET-2 is equipped with a plumb bob, NiMH battery pack and charger, alkaline battery pack, adjustment tools, rain cover, multilingual user manual, and a rugged, compact, O-ring-protected carrying case.

products.name: HV1305C
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV1305C red beam laser is the most rugged and cost-effective laser that provides both horizontal and vertical alignment. Even under harsh construction site conditions, the laser delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster and smarter.

products.name: Spectra GL612N
description_items: The GL612N grade laser offers a single-grade capability of 25% and is also fully self-leveling in the vertical for building axis alignment or 90-degree setup. Simple, rugged, and user-friendly with a menu-driven interface replicated on the wireless remote, the GL612N is the first choice for any contractor needing versatile grade capabilities.

products.name: LR60 & LR60W
description_items: The LR60 & LR60W laser machine display receivers are designed to be used as standalone display receivers on grading and excavation equipment, including: bulldozers, excavators, backhoe loaders, scrapers, and trenchers.

products.name: DG613G
description_items: Compact and powerful, the DG613G ultra-bright green beam laser combines outstanding performance with productivity. Advanced features are user-friendly and allow for easy, quick setup.

products.name: Spectra LL500
description_items: The LL500 laser level is a one-person leveling system designed for longer measurements across the entire construction site. Precise, stable, and reliable, the LL500 has a working diameter of 500 m, increasing productivity by reducing the need for multiple setups on a large construction site.

products.name: Spectra LT56 & LT58G
description_items: The device is compact, lightweight, and easy to mount. Installations on high ceiling structures will be a quick and easy task compared to conventional heavy rotary lasers and cumbersome mounts.

products.name: Spectra DG613
description_items: Compact and powerful, the DG613 red beam laser combines outstanding performance with productivity. Advanced features are user-friendly and allow for easy, quick setup. Easy to use, with the new menu-driven user interface.

products.name: Spectra GL622N Grade Laser
description_items: Spectra Precision® GL622N/GL622IR grade laser. Easy-to-use, fully featured automatic grade lasers. The GL622N dual-grade laser is a rugged, self-leveling laser with a grade capability of -25% to +25% and can be used for a variety of grading, excavation, and alignment applications by general and specialty contractors.

products.name: Spectra GL412N
description_items: The GL412N is a single-grade laser that, in addition to its grade range of up to 15%, also offers long-range operation. Operate the laser with remotes with greater range. With a wireless remote with a range of up to 100 m, you have the ability to make grade adjustments and perform them remotely, which can significantly reduce setup time.

products.name: Spectra GL710
description_items: Designed for grading professionals, the Spectra Precision GL700 series of grade lasers is the most advanced on the market. With industry-leading performance and accuracy, you can be confident that the GL700 series delivers on slope work over long distances and high accuracy requirements.

products.name: Spectra LL1505C
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® LL1505C laser level is the most rugged laser level available, tough enough to handle a variety of general and concrete construction applications. The rugged laser can withstand drops of up to 1 m onto concrete and tripod tip-overs of up to 1.5 m. This strength, combined with full weather and dust resistance, reduces downtime and lowers repair costs over the product's lifetime.

products.name: Spectra LL300N
description_items: The Spectra LL300N laser level features a rugged design with a 'Hardhat' rotor guard that provides excellent protection against drops and weather. Designed to withstand severe drops of up to 1 m directly onto concrete or up to 1.5 m when tipping over on a tripod, this means less downtime and costs due to damage from accidental falls.

products.name: Spectra DG813 Pipe Laser
description_items: When speed, improved reliability, ruggedness, and long-lasting performance are required for pipe laying, the DG813 is the answer. Fully waterproof, with a large self-leveling grade range, the DG813 is so fast, so smart, and so easy to use that it is an unrivaled laser tool for pipe laying.

products.name: HV1305GC
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV1305GC green beam laser is the most rugged and cost-effective laser that provides both horizontal and vertical alignment. Even under harsh construction site conditions, the laser delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster and smarter.

products.name: HV302
description_items: The HV302 can handle a variety of horizontal, vertical, and plumb applications for both indoor and outdoor projects. Its highly visible beam allows for simultaneous rotating and 90-degree plumb references and is also easy to spot in brightly lit interiors. Various configurations ensure you have the right tool for the job.

products.name: HR1220
description_items: The HR1220 laser receiver detects both red and green laser beams generated by cross-line lasers such as the LT52R, LT52G, LT56, and LT58G. The receiver can extend the indoor working range of these cross-line lasers and increase versatility by enabling outdoor use.

products.name: LP51 & LP51G Laser Pointers
description_items: The Spectra LP51 and LP51G 5-beam laser pointers are designed for a wide range of interior construction applications. These rugged laser pointers offer multiple benefits for general and interior construction contractors, electricians, plumbers, and a variety of tradespeople.

products.name: HV302G
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV302G Horizontal/Vertical Laser offers exceptional versatility and superior green beam visibility for increased productivity at a great price. The HV302G can handle a variety of horizontal, vertical, and plumb applications optimized for indoor projects. Even under bright indoor conditions, the HV302G's highly visible green beam delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster and smarter.

products.name: HR320
description_items: The HR320 laser receiver is a rugged laser receiver for outdoor leveling applications. LCDs on the front and back display a 5-segment slope arrow indicating the slope position. A loud buzzer is designed for noisy construction sites.

products.name: LT52G & LT52R Cross-Line Lasers
description_items: The Spectra LT52G and LT52R are the tools for all trades. They eliminate the need for a contractor to buy two tools by combining a 5-beam laser pointer with a horizontal and vertical cross-line laser in one product. The versatile, self-leveling laser tool can be used in a variety of construction applications.

products.name: Spectra GL422N
description_items: The GL422N is a dual-grade laser that, in addition to its grade range of up to 15%, also offers long-range operation. Operate the laser with remotes with greater range. With a wireless remote with a range of up to 100 m, you have the ability to make grade adjustments remotely, which can significantly reduce setup time.

products.name: LT20 & LT20G Line Lasers
description_items: The Spectra LT20 cross-line laser is a self-leveling multipurpose tool with 1 vertical plane and 1 horizontal plane. For interior construction and renovations, the LT20 laser is used for horizontal and vertical alignment, wall layout, acoustic ceiling installation, and fine woodworking.

products.name: Spectra GL722
description_items: The GL722 dual-grade laser is one of the most advanced grade lasers on the market. Long-range operation, advanced wireless remote control, grade adjustment, plane lock, and automatic axis alignment mean you can perform quick but highly precise setups for any grade application.
